request.description:
Get the office profile information.

**Required Headers:**

- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`
    

**Response:**

- Office profile details

request.description:
Update the office profile information.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `name` (string, optional): Updated office name
- `phone` (string, optional): Updated phone number
- `address` (string, optional): Updated address
- `description` (string, optional): Updated description

Get the office gallery images.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Array of gallery images with details

request.description:
Upload a new image to the office gallery.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body (form-data):**
- `image` (file, required): The image file to upload
- `caption` (string, optional): Caption for the image

request.description:
Set an image as the featured image for the office.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Gallery image ID to set as featured

request.description:
Get the office documents.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Array of documents with details

Upload a new document for the office.

**Required Headers:**

- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`
    

**Request Body (form-data):**

- `document` (file, required): The document file to upload
    
- `type` (string, required): Document type (license, registration, insurance, etc.)
    
- `title` (string, required): Document title

request.description:
Get all bookings for the office with filtering options.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Query Parameters:**
- `status` (string, optional): Filter by booking status (pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed)
- `from_date` (date, optional): Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `to_date` (date, optional): Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `per_page` (integer, optional): Items per page (default: 15)
